// Pivot 0, 0
int Flipper_R[16] = {
	1, 61,
	1, 53,
	6, 47,
	86, 5,
	99, 12,
	99, 29,
	14, 64,
	6, 64
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000

	0.009434f, 0.859155f,
	0.009434f, 0.746479f,
